section-1.heading: Stay Connected
section-1.details: In this age of communication, keep in touch with your contacts across the internet without access to an active internet connection. Save access to your favourite communications platforms while online, use them while offline.

section-2.heading: How it works
section-2.details: With SMSWithoutBorders, you can send emails, tweet and chat on telegram without an active internet connection. By using our andriod app, you can send messages securely through a network of SMS gateways to stay connected
section-2.paragraph-1: By setting up your account while you have an internet connection, you can continue to communicate later using SMS when your no longer have internet access
section-2.paragraph-2: Our SMS gateways are freely available. Learn how to set up yours below
section-2.tutorial-1: Learn how to setup your account and app
section-2.tutorial-2: Learn how to setup gateway clients

section-3.heading: Getting Started with SWOB
section-3.details: With SMSWithoutBorders, you can send emails, tweet and chat on Telegram without an active internet connection. By using our andriod app, you can send messages securely through a network of SMS gateways to stay connected

1.heading: Signup for an account
1.details: Register for an SMSWithoutBorders account with a valid phone number, thats it. All other details are optional

2.heading: Connect Accounts
2.details: Securely Link your accounts on platforms we support like Gmail, X and telegram using OAuth2 technology so that you can continue to communicate on them when offline. We only request the bare minimum permissions for our services to work. You can learn more in our privacy policy

3.heading: Synchronize Mobile App
3.details: Synchronize your linked account with the SMSWithoutBorders mobile app. This process ensures your can communicate begin securely over SMS. The app will generate unique keys for obfuscating your messages.

4.heading: Setup Gateways
4.details: SMSWithoutBorders relies on gateways to ensure communication. We maintain some but you can also setup your own. By doing so, you will be helping other users on the network communicate through your gateway. Gateway owners can also use their gateways for bulk messaging.

section-3.tutorial-1: Learn how to setup your your account and app
section-3.tutorial-2: Learn how to setup gateway clients

1.heading: Accessibility
1.details: SWOBâ€™s mobile app allows users to have offline communication wherever they are. With as simple as having an SMS message smartphone you can maintain communications with your online platforms

2.heading: Security
2.details: SWOB transmits messages in securely encrypted formats. This secures every communication from being accessed by intermediate parties while in transit.

3.heading: Open source
3.details: Every component of SWOB is open sourced! From the mobile app to the routing mechanisms we use to get your SMS messages to reach your intended platforms

4.heading: Decentralized
4.details: SWOB is built to work in decentralized models. Anyone can host a SWOB server. Itâ€™s as easy as understanding how to use it

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.details: Using SWOB is as easy as authenticating your credentials

downloads.heading: Downloads
downloads.details: Stay Connected with our mobile apps and other resources

section-2.heading: Operating Systems
section-2.details: Custom gateway client OS images for raspberry pi

beta-testing.heading: SWOB v2 Beta testing
beta-testing.details: Please follow the instructions below on how to test SMSWithoutBorders

details.part-2: if you don't have one already

details.part-1: Login to your account so that you can add platforms
Save Gmail, X and telegram so that you can use the SWOB app offline. Click on each platform to see the save button
details.part-2: Saving X on your phone may require you to click the save button twice if you have the X app already installed
details.caption: Note

details.part-1: After saving all the platforms, logout from your account and head over to the playstore to download the app. Click on the button bellow to open playstore
details.part-2: Once there you should see the following screen
details.part-3: If you do not have the (Beta) near the app name, scroll down and select join. This will take some time about 5mins to 30mins to add you to the beta program. After that, you should be able to install the new app. After installing, open the app and confirm you have the screen below to make sure you have the latest version

details.part-1: In the app click on the Synchronize button then continue. This will open a page for you to login. After login, scroll down and click/tap on the sync button to access the Synchronization page.
details.part-2: Once on the Synchronization page, scroll down and click sync. This will then open the page below.
details.part-3: Click on open app and enter your password to finish Synchronization.

6.heading: Go offline!!!
6.details: You can now use SMSWithoutBorders offline. turn off your internet connection. Activate a text bundle and send messages on all the platforms you have saved. We don't mind if you tag us while you're at it :)

details.part-1: Thank you so much for taking the time to test the app. We appreciate your time and support

alerts.account-created: your account has been created, please login
alerts.registration-error: Sorry we could not complete your registration. If error persists, please contact support
alerts.app-redirect: Please click on the button below to open the app

wallet.heading: Save Accounts
wallet.details: Once you save your accounts, you can begin using the app to communicate through them as if you are connected online. You can delete and save accounts at any time, however you will need to have an internet connection to do so.
wallet.instructions1: To get started, Pick a platform you want to communicate with offline, and click the save button.
wallet.instructions2: Your saved accounts can be revoked anytime. Sync this account with the app to start communicating with them.
wallet.instructions3: Our supported platforms list allows you to save for multiple platforms. Syncing with the app is required to communicate offline.
wallet.instructions4: We are working on including more platforms, please check regularly for the updated list of supported platforms or also check out our blog

info.gmail: On the authorization page, select the option to send email on your behalf
info.twitter: If you already have the X app installed, please open it before clicking on the save button below. The app will only prompt you for authorization if it is running

revoke-dialog.heading: Revoke token
revoke-dialog.details: This will permanently remove this token from your account and cannot be reversed. Enter your password to Confirm

prompt-dialog.heading: Do you have the X app installed ?
prompt-dialog.details: Please open the app then return to this page and click continue

alerts.load-error: Sorry we could not load platforms. If error persists, please contact support

phone-verification.heading: Telegram
phone-verification.details: Please fill in your phone number to begin

alerts.code-sent: A verification code has been sent to your Telegram. Check code in your Telegram app
alerts.authorization-error: Sorry, you are not authorized to make this request

alerts.two-steps-verification-enabled: Two-steps verification is enabled on your Telegram account and a password is required, please enter your Telegram two-steps verification password

two-steps-verification.heading: Telegram Two-Steps Verification
two-steps-verification.paragraph-1: Two-steps verification is enabled on your Telegram account. Please enter your Telegram two-Steps verification password in the field provided below.
two-steps-verification.paragraph-2: Please note that for your privacy and security, your password will not be read or stored by SMSWithoutBorders. Additionally, we highly recommend that you change your password regularly to further enhance the security of your account.

password.label: Telegram Two-Steps Verification Password
password.validation-error: Please enter your Telegram two-Steps verification password

code-verification.heading: Verification
code-verification.paragraph-1: A verification code has been sent to your Telegram app. Please enter it below. This process confirms the number provided is active and can be used for communication when the time comes.
code-verification.paragraph-2: We also require you to provide the code sent to you by SMS as a means of guaranteeing you have the necessary (own) rights to the required phone number. This will help us prevent actors from using non consented phone numbers to create accounts - preventing the owners from further doing so

error-messages.otp-request: Sorry we could not verify your phone number. If error persists, please contact support
error-messages.otp-validation: Sorry we could not verify your code. If error persists, please contact support

section-1.details: Please click on the link below to save tokens

summary.caption: learn more
summary.details: Synchronization becomes available only after you perform an action that updates your security configurations. An example is saving access in the wallet.

section-2.paragraph-1: This lets you use the SW/OB secure gateway for all messages
section-2.paragraph-2: Click the sync button to connect your app with this account. This will update your app with the saved accounts which can then be used offline without an internet connection. This process requires an internet connection and is necessary each time you save another account.

alerts.no-platforms: Sorry it seems you havent saved any tokens

dashboard.start: Let us help you get started with setting up your SMSWithoutBorders account.
dashboard.description2: In this step we will save your online accounts, which can be used with the SWOB app offline. You can save as many accounts as you may need to use without an internet connection.
dashboard.description3: The app allows you send out messages through your saved platforms using SMS messaging on your mobile device. The app encrypts your messages making them secure while transmitting through SMS. In this step we will download the app on your preferred android device.
dashboard.description4: Finally, to begin using the app you need to connect it to this account. We will help you through a simple automated process once you click the synchronization button.
dashboard.completed: Congratulations! You have successfully set up your SWOB account ðŸŽ‰Please note you will need an internet connection each time you add a new account, so that you can connect it to the app

alerts.load-error: Sorry we could not locate your metrics. If error persists, please contact support
